### Finding 1 ðŸ”´ [HIGH]

**Audit department shows a 5.5-year tenure gap (Male avg > Female avg)**

> **Handbook Reference 2:** Membership: Open to all associates. Active membership: ~620 across all offices. âžœ **Verdict:** The tenure disparity in Audit signals higher female attrition or later hiring. This conflicts with [Aparajita BRG (Section 3.5)] which commits to 'reduce attrition among women associates in years 3-5 of tenure' and ensure equitable retention across the India office.

### Finding 8 ðŸ”´ [HIGH]

**Severe pipeline narrowing: 63.0% female at Associate level drops to 12.5% at Director level**

> **Handbook Reference 1:** 3. Inclusive Promotion Practices â€” We will review promotion and succession planning processes annually for bias, using both quantitative analysis and associate feedback. 4. Leadership Accountability â€” Every partner and director will include DEI objectives in their annual performance goals. Progress on these goals will factor into compensation decisions.

> **Handbook Reference 2:** Key Initiatives: - Women in Leadership Accelerator: 12-month cohort program for high-potential senior managers and directors, including executive coaching, board-readiness training, and sponsor matching. - Flexible Work Advocacy: Partnered with firm leadership to design equitable flexible-work policies that do not penalize associates in promotion or compensation decisions. - Pay Equity Champion â€¦

> **Handbook Reference 3:** Core DEI Principles: - Equity of Opportunity: Every associate has fair access to mentorship, stretch assignments, and advancement pathways. - Inclusive Leadership: Leaders are accountable for creating psychologically safe teams where dissent and diverse viewpoints are welcomed. - Data-Driven Progress: We measure representation, pay equity, promotion rates, and engagement scores across demograph â€¦

âžœ **Verdict:** The steep drop-off in female representation across job levels indicates systemic advancement barriers. This directly contradicts [DEI Governance (Section 4), Inclusive Promotion Practices (CEO Pledge #3)] â€” the CEO pledges annual bias reviews of promotion processes and the WoW BRG runs a Leadership Accelerator program to address exactly this pattern.
